title: Regulation of deep and shallow hole/electron trap states and charge conducting behaviors of dielectric tribo-materials for maximizing retained charges
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,7382-7393
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03008G, Paper
Jian Wang, Shuyan Xu, Gui Li, Huiyuan Wu, Kaixian Li, Ai Chen, Qionghua Zhao, Shaoke Fu, Chuncai Shan, Yi Xi, Chenguo Hu
This work utilizes the UHCSI strategy to quantify the ability of 30 conventional tribo-materials to trap and de-trap positive/negative charges and reveal that the polymer's group composition influences trap states.
